name: RootyTrail - Global Game Jam 2023
description:
RootyTrail is an Arcade game (a snake like) created during the Global Game Jam 2023 in 48 hours.

In this game, you have to finish the 10 levels. For that, you have to grow until goal which is represented by a red light.

CREDITS :

(https://ytalanah.itch.io/)
